Content.Text: <MYNAME>, are you awake? Can I come in?

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Would you like to take a
walk with me today? I'll show you a
great place for gathering stuff!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! I've been looking for someone to
go walking with, but there aren't
exactly a lot of people here in town.
<PAGE>
Ah, please excuse me! I shouldn't be
talking like that, should I. Let's just
get moving.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are! Look, <MYNAME>. That's the
spot I was telling you about.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you search that <RED>stump</RED> there, you will
find nuts or herbs. Give it a try!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a great walk. Shall we head
back to town now?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thanks a lot for today. It was
great to be able to take a walk with
you.
<PAGE>
Let's do it again sometime!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Oh, hold on?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, look over there. There's
someone there.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's quite rare for anyone to come to
the town! Let's talk to her.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, it's so rare to see anyone around
here, we just had to talk to you.
<PAGE>
I'm Hana. This is <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice to meet you. My name is <BLUE>Iroha</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you so much for talking to me. In
fact, I was having a bit of trouble, so
maybe you can help me out.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I've heard that it is possible to mine
ore in this region, but I can't find the
place...

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're right, you can find ore here. The
forest up ahead is one such spot.
<PAGE>
We didn't see anything like that there
this morning though, did we...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for your kindness. It seems my
information was correct. I'm pleased.
<PAGE>
I'm thinking of staying here in town for
a while, to collect as much ore as I
can. Could you direct me to the inn?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, dear. We had an inn up until
just a few days ago, but now it's closed
down.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
It is? That might be a problem...
<PAGE>
If you don't have an inn then I don't
have a choice, though, do I? I'll stay
in the next town over...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...An empty house?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's an excellent idea, now isn't it.
<PAGE>
Let's go and ask Dunhill right away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a forge...!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll go and get Dunhill. You two wait
here.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe you have a forge in
town. It's like a dream come true!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, of course. I haven't told you about
myself yet, have I.
<PAGE>
I'm travelling from region to region as
I train to become a blacksmith.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Regular inns don't exactly have a forge
inside them, so it makes to hard to keep
up a regular training schedule.
<PAGE>
If I live here, though, I'll be able to
train whenever I want!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, you must be Iroha? My name is
Dunhill. You want to live here in town,
do you?
<PAGE>
Could you start by telling me a bit
about yourself?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course. As I was just telling
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...and that's why I'd like to live here.
<PAGE>
Would it be possible for me to live in
this house, then? I'll pay rent.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course you can! It's a waste to just
have the house sitting there.
<PAGE>
It'll be a big help to us to have a
blacksmith living in town, too. Great to
meet you, Iroha.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
T-Thank you so much! I'll do my very
best!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll get everything ready that you'll
need to live here, then.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll let Emma and Neil know about this,
too. See you soon, Iroha.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you.
<PAGE>
I've found a place to live and a place
to train, all thanks to you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not at all. This is all thanks to you,
<MYNAME>! Please, take this in thanks.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. Your bag is full. I'll send it
to the <BLUE>Toolbox</BLUE> in your house, then.

Got the <GREEN>Hammer</GREEN> and the <GREEN>Axe</GREEN>! Check out
your <BLUE>Toolbox</BLUE> later!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, You don't have enough room in your
bag. Can you make <BLUE>two</BLUE> spaces?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have enough room in your bag.
Can you make <BLUE>two</BLUE> spaces?

<SPEED_IMME>
Got the <GREEN>Hammer</GREEN> and the <GREEN>Axe</GREEN>!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Equip the Hammer or Axe to use it. The
Hammer can make <GREEN>stone</GREEN> by smashing rocks
and the Axe can make <GREEN>wood</GREEN> from trees.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can also <RED>chop down trees</RED> using the
axe. This might be useful to clear space
in the town or on farmland.
<PAGE>
You can get a lot of <GREEN>branches</GREEN> from
fallen trees.
<PAGE>
The axe I just gave you can be used on
<GREEN>broadleaf trees</GREEN>, the kind with round
leaves. Give it a try!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, I know these aren't the kind of
things people normally give as gifts.
But that's all I have right now...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You run a farm, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then you need tools, don't you. I'm glad
my gifts are going to be useful to you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We're going to be living in the same
town from now on, <MYNAME>, so I hope we
can become friends.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I get any useful information on other
tools or farming equipment I'll pass it
on to you, <MYNAME>.
